feature.label: Ansi Console
feature.description: Ansi Console uses ANSI escape sequences to color the console output. This can be pretty handy when using something like jansi (http://jansi.fusesource.org) But is should also work from Perl, C++, or Groovy, or any other Eclipse hosted language.
